> hYDRAS:
>
> "Follow me" said Hydras while cautionsly walked to the unknow"Keep an eye if
> a signature appears: Skayshadow's and his team or our 'Guests' ".

OOC: Just a few questions: You said Hydras is going into the unknown,
does that mean Hydras is going out in a random direction or is he
going towards the mining city? Will Hydras and his team be taking any
precautions as far as security, or is everyone just sorta traveling in
disorganized pack? Is everyone going with Hydras or are some staying
behind? Will Hydras be doing anything with the shuttle like leaving a
gaurd with it, sending it back to base or whatever?

Oh, and as a note - you can do as you like, but keep in mind that the
ground here is fairly open and barren, which means very few places to
hide unless someone has some sort of invisibility or something.

I look forward to your reply :)

Preston
